ComicInfo.Summary:
Dartmoor Part 1: Savage and Silk head to Dartmoor Prison to rescue Samual Frost, but as they escape across the moor, they run into the moor monsters.
Flesh Book 1 Part 10: Old One Eye and her tyrannosaurs continue their war with Reagan and the other humans.
Harlem Heroes Part 10: Giant and the team, in the midst of a game with the Montezuma's Mashers, go after Artie Gruber, whose revenge desires Giant dead!
Dan Dare Part 10: The Biog's throw one of Jupiter's moons, destroying ten ships and sending many others off course. Dare embarks on a suicide mission.
On the Roof of the World: John Probe, full of energy, captures Eastern spy master and trained killer Igor Khuvosky.
Robot Wars, Part 1: "That ain't a man - it's a robot!" Call-Me-Kenneth (who has "steel appeal") starts the robot wars.
